WorkItem.Description:
In Excel it is possible to define for each sheet a custom zoom level in percent (view setting). Shown in MS Office Excel 2007 screen shot:
 
http://img395.imageshack.us/img395/8201/excelzoomfeatureia3.png
 
Currently, we do not seem to have support for this feature in the PHPExcel core. 
 
Note that this is not the print scale (print zoom level) which is already supported in PHPExcel, but the zoom level for screen view.
WorkItem.Summary: Support for screen zoom level (feature request)
